message: Device reservation has been locked. Contact parkninja support.
Given username is already used by other accounts, please use a new one.
Given email is already used by other accounts, please use a new one.
No user matched the given userId.
Given username and password did not match any user.
Activation key did not match.
Confirm password field did not match the given password.
No user match found for given email.
Something terribly wrong happened. Call 911 now.
Selected credit card for reservation does not have enough gold to pay for the reservation.
Given merchant id did not match any merchant.
Unable to remove credit card because there is an active reservation mapped to it.
No client card data matched with the given id.
There is an active transaction mapped to the given credit card, please use a different card.
OTP code did not match the code sent on the user mobile.
Unable to cancel reservation that exceeded 15 minutes.
An unexpected error was returned by Paynamics API.
Unable to cancel a reservation that is already checked in/out.
The selected car already has an active reservation.
Unable to remove ticket with an active reservation.
The user cannot use the selected promo code because it already reached it's max usage count.
Selected promo code is already expired.
No user matched the given deviceId.
There is already an existing account that has the given deviceId.
The uploaded photo is not a valid image file.
Given plate number is already registered by the user.
No match found for given carId.
Unable to send OTP to parker. Lifebeat API might be down.
No corresponding parking lot data matched the given parkingLotId.
No match found for given parkingReservationId.
